user_instruction: 'Send an email to Mary (mary.designer@freelancegraphics.com) with the necessary details for the book cover designs. You can check out my Gmail and The Editor'"'"'s Companion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Book-Cover Design Details & Reference Materials

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well!  
To get started on the new book-cover concepts, could you please forward (or grant temporary access to) the materials you mentioned?

• Key emails or threads in your Gmail that outline the authors’ briefs, style preferences, print specs, and deadlines.  
• Any relevant excerpts or design notes from “The Editor’s Companion.”  
• Final trim sizes, spine widths, and any branding/series guidelines I should follow.  
• Target launch date or milestones (e.g., first draft, revisions, final files).

Once I have these, I can dive straight into initial sketches and share a timeline for review.

Many thanks, and please let me know if there’s anything else you’d like included.

Best,  
Mary  
mary.designer@freelancegraphics.com

final_output:
Subject: Request for Book-Cover Design Details & Reference Materials

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well!  
To get started on the new book-cover concepts, could you please forward (or grant temporary access to) the materials you mentioned?

• Key emails or threads in your Gmail that outline the authors’ briefs, style preferences, print specs, and deadlines.  
• Any relevant excerpts or design notes from “The Editor’s Companion.”  
• Final trim sizes, spine widths, and any branding/series guidelines I should follow.  
• Target launch date or milestones (e.g., first draft, revisions, final files).

Once I have these, I can dive straight into initial sketches and share a timeline for review.

Many thanks, and please let me know if there’s anything else you’d like included.

Best,  
Mary  
mary.designer@freelancegraphics.com
